subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: RALEIGH, N.C., June 7 (AP) — Skip Cunningham has pretty much seen it all. Dingy arenas. A standoff involving a Zamboni. Thirteen-hour flights with three connections.
snippet: RALEIGH, N.C., June 7 (AP) — Skip Cunningham has pretty much seen it all. Dingy arenas. A standoff involving a Zamboni. Thirteen-hour flights with three connections.
